attributes.action: remove their support for the Football Association bid for Stadium MK to be one of the 15 potential venues that will make up England's bid to host the 2018 World Cup.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The bid to stage this prestigious world competition in England should not be tarnished by associating with MK Dons, a franchised football team, to the bid. This team and stadium represent all that is wrong with the modern English game and would not exist had it not been for a disgraceful decision condoned by the Football Association.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
